item.title: [Secret Network] Update SGX Installation Guide for Ubuntu 22.04
item.description:
Contribution Description

Updated the SGX installation documentation to support Ubuntu 22.04. This update ensures that developers setting up Secret Network nodes on newer Ubuntu versions have correct and up-to-date instructions for SGX configuration.

View on GitHub
